"use client" import type React from "react" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useAuth } from "../../contexts/AuthContext" import { skillsAPI, pointsAPI } from "../../services/api" import type { Skill, Order } from "../../types" import { UserIcon, PencilIcon, AcademicCapIcon, StarIcon, TrophyIcon, ClockIcon, CheckIcon, XMarkIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline" const Profile: React.FC = () => { const { user, updateProfile } = useAuth() const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [mySkills, setMySkills] = useState([]) const [myOrders, setMyOrders] = useState([]) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ first_name: user?.first_name || "", last_name: user?.last_name || "", email: user?.email || "", bio: user?.bio || "", phone: user?.phone || "", }) useEffect(() => { if (user) { setFormData({ first_name: user.first_name, last_name: user.last_name, email: user.email, bio: user.bio || "", phone: user.phone || "", }) fetchUserData() } }, [user]) const fetchUserData = async () => { try { const [skillsResponse, ordersResponse] = await Promise.all([ skillsAPI.getSkills({ instructor: user?.id }), pointsAPI.getOrders(), ]) setMySkills(skillsResponse.results) setMyOrders(ordersResponse.results) } catch (error) { console.error("Failed to fetch user data") } } const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })) } const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) const result = await updateProfile(formData) if (result.success) { setIsEditing(false) } setLoading(false) } const handleCancel = () => { if (user) { setFormData({ first_name: user.first_name, last_name: user.last_name, email: user.email, bio: user.bio || "", phone: user.phone || "", }) } setIsEditing(false) } const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case "completed": return "bg-green-100 text-green-800" case "in_progress": return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800" case "pending": return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800" case "cancelled": return "bg-red-100 text-red-800" default: return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800" } } if (!user) { return (
) } return (
{/* Profile Header */}

{user.first_name} {user.last_name}

{user.email}

{user.rating.toFixed(1)} rating • Member since {new Date(user.date_joined).getFullYear()}
{/* Stats */}
{user.points_balance}
Points
{user.skills_taught}
Skills Taught
{user.skills_learned}
Skills Learned

Rating
